author: Omkar Godbole
title: Return of Zero Interest Rate Policy as Swiss Central Bank Cuts Rates
description: The return to zero comes as tariffs threaten to deflate nations with trade surplus, such as Switzerland and China.
content:
A COVID-era feature that characterized the bull run in all corners of financial markets, including bitcoin 
, has made a comeback in Switzerland, one of the most financial powerhouses of the world.T… [+607 chars]
